main.name: Vinay Valson
main.description: I'm a self-taught full stack web & mobile developer who is always learning new things. You can find me here
main.bio: Demonstrating adaptability is as intrinsic as being technically sound. I am seeking an opportunity where I can productively utilize my technical, communication and presentation skills. I am fond of learning new stuff, embracing change and socialising with creative folks.
main.contactmessage: If you feel I would fit well in your organization please do drop a message through the given form

experience.title: Associate Consultant
experience.description: Working  under the DigX Part of Oracle’s Banking Division. Engineered J2EE applications with JAVA, JPA, Oracle WebLogic Server and Apache CORDOVA. Built innovative microservices and Web Services using JaRXS (Java REST development classes) and API testing using PostMan

experience.title: Software Developer Intern
experience.description: Deal Management System and Widget Development. Created Bookmark widget for Ubuntu systems using Gnome toolkit. Same was implemented as a chrome extension and Electron. Testing and correction of other teams' project, Deal Management web application created using MEAN stack

experience.title: Tech Developer/R&D Technology Intern
experience.description: Bitcoin Wallet Tracking. Made an Android app that enables tracking of ERC -20 contracts. The app alerts the user of bitcoin whales and high value transactions of ERC -20 contracts that take place in the Cryptocurrency market. JSON parsing was done using JAVA on API’s provided by etherscan.io
